thread.title: IT Financial Analyst at Infinity MedStaff (Columbus, OH)
thread.title_full: IT Financial Analyst at Infinity MedStaff (Columbus, OH)

title: IT Financial Analyst at Infinity MedStaff (Columbus, OH)
text: Source: HospitalJobsOnline Description: IT Financial Analyst Assist with the management of the revenue cycle to include Billing/Accounts Receivable, Scheduling, Admissions/Registration and HIM (Health Information Management) applications. Financial Analyst Job Duties: - Recommends solutions and workflow changes through the collection of information from customers and vendors that are in alignment with hospital and departmental objectives. - Maintain and maximize the use of installed applications for customers. - Provides information by answering questions and requests. - Maintains quality service by establishing and enforcing standards. - Create, maintain and manage associated dictionaries. - Contributes to team effort. Database Administrator Skills and Qualifications: Promoting Process Improvement, Problem Solving, Presenting Technical Information, Quality Focused, Database Management, Meditech Dictionary Maintenance, Attention to Detail, Assist with Information Security Policies related to access to data and regulatory requirements The following experiences are preferred. - Meditech 6.x BAR Module - Meditech 6.x Admissions/Registration Module - Meditech 6.x Scheduling Module - Meditech 6.x HIM Module - Working within a Hospital Environment The following experiences are beneficial - ePremis Experience - Craneware Experience Responsibilities and Requirements: Comments:
